name: The Automation Department
description:
Review us for Ludum Dare 49!

The Automation Department is a game about an unstable office environment where things keep breaking down and you can hardly keep up! Buy robots to do your tasks for you  until you automate yourself out of a job! This game is played with the mouse only. Press any key to pause.

Character Art & Environment Art
Milo Moore
@extyrannomon

Sound Design & Systems Programming
Alex Cecrle
@Alexzoin Technical Art & Animation

@Camzoin Gameplay Programming & Implementation
